name: Elliott Community (The) - Long-Term Care Home
comment:
114-bed long-term care home * residential care for private rooms, semi-private rooms, and basic rooms * 24-hour nursing and personal care * access to a doctor and other health professionals
  • bedding and furniture
  • laundry and housekeeping
  • meals
  • personal hygiene supplies
  • medical supplies and equipment (such as catheters, ostomy bags, or wound care supplies)
  • assistance with medication and activities of daily living
  • spiritual care
  • recreation and social programs
serviceProvisionCode: Rates set by the Ontario Ministry of Long-Term Care * subsidies for basic rates may be available for eligible applicants

Elliott Community (The) - Long-Term Care Home

114-bed long-term care home * residential care for private rooms, semi-private rooms, and basic rooms * 24-hour nursing and personal care * access to a doctor and other health professionals<br><ul><li>bedding and furniture</li><li>laundry and housekeeping</li><li>meals</li><li>personal hygiene supplies</li><li>medical supplies and equipment (such as catheters, ostomy bags, or wound care supplies) </li><li>assistance with medication and activities of daily living</li><li>spiritual care</li><li>recreation and social programs</li></ul>
